title: Russian court shuts down Memorial Human Rights Center, day after sister group ordered closed
content:
1. Russian court shuts down Memorial Human Rights Center, day after sister group ordered closed  CNN
  2. Russian authorities shut down leading human rights group - BBC News  BBC News
  3. U.S. condemns Russian decision to shut down rights group  Reuters
  4. Opinion | Putin wants to shut down Russia's Memorial, but he can't erase the past  The Washington Post
  5. Russian court orders closure of leading rights group Memorial  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: ロシアの裁判所がメモリアル人権センターを閉鎖、姉妹グループが閉鎖を命じられた翌日に
俄罗斯法院关闭了纪念人权中心，这是在姐妹团体被命令关闭的第二天。
俄羅斯法院關閉了紀念人權中心，這是在姐妹團體被命令關閉的第二天。
